summary: After losing her job at a local factory, a single mother enrolls in a housekeeper training program, soon landing work cleaning the Paris apartment of handsome but cocky power broker.
cast: Karin Viard|Gilles Lellouche|Audrey Lamy|Jean-Pierre Martins|Raphaële Godin|Fred Ulysse|Kevin Bishop|Marine Vacth|Flavie Bataillie|Tim Pigott-Smith|Philippe Lefebvre|Lunis Sakji|Juliette Navis|Camille Zouaoui|Adrienne Vereecke|Guillaume Ranson|Xavier Alcan|Xavier Mathieu|Zinedine Soualem|Rémi Gillodts|Évelyne Dekoninck|Bernard Debreyne|Abderrahmane Houfani|Sophie Watrelot|Andrew Price|Sandrine Drezen Conchillo|Michel Masiero|Haby Diarra|Jean-Benoît Lengeley|Édeline Dufly|Husky Kihal|Alessandro Cecchini|Lucie Desclozeaux|Suzanne Von Aichinger|Mariame N'Diaye|Flannan Obé|Alex Lutz|Edwin Krüger|Lisa Manili|Emily Head|James Puddephatt|John Vernon|Hervé Degunst|Eric Paul|Jeanne Millet|Aline Nolasco|Cédric Klapisch|Magdalena Malina
title: Ma part du gâteau
